name: Fancy Pimento Cheese
author: TNCOLLEGEGIRL
summary: I had the best pimento cheese at a resort in North Carolina and replicated it in my kitchen.  Tastes great with flatbread crackers, topped with chow chow and a slice of pickled okra!  Try it!
ingredients: ½ cup minced roasted red pepper
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as Cholula®)
directions: Using the smallest holes of a box grater, grate half the Cheddar cheese
Grate the remaining Cheddar cheese on the next larger size holes
Stir together the Cheddar cheese, chives, roasted red pepper, cream cheese, pickle juice, mayonnaise, hot pepper sauce, and black pepper in a bowl until evenly combined
